verses.verse: אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תָּשׁ֨וּב <S%H7725><s%> If thou wilt return יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> O Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to תָּשׁ֑וּב <S%H7725><s%> return וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if תָּסִ֧יר <S%H5493><s%> unto me and if thou wilt put away שִׁקּוּצֶ֛יךָ <S%H8251><s%> thine abominations מִפָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> out of my sight וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and will not תָנֽוּד׃ <S%H5110><s%> then shalt thou not remove

וְנִשְׁבַּ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H7650><s%> And thou shalt swear חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בֶּאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> in truth בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment וּבִצְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> and in righteousness וְהִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless ב֛וֹ גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> and the nations וּב֥וֹ יִתְהַלָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> themselves in him and in him shall they glory ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the men יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְלִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem נִ֥ירוּ <S%H5214><s%> Break up לָכֶ֖ם נִ֑יר <S%H5215><s%> your fallow ground וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּזְרְע֖וּ <S%H2232><s%> and sow אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> among קוֹצִֽים׃ <S%H6975><s%> not among thorns

הִמֹּ֣לוּ <S%H4135><s%> Circumcise לַיהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> yourselves to the LORD וְהָסִ֙רוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> and take away עָרְל֣וֹת <S%H6190><s%> the foreskins לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <S%H3824><s%> of your heart אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ye men יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or תֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> come forth כָאֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> like fire חֲמָתִ֗י <S%H2534><s%> lest my fury וּבָעֲרָה֙ <S%H1197><s%> and burn וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> none מְכַבֶּ֔ה <S%H3518><s%> that none can quench מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> [it] because רֹ֥עַ <S%H7455><s%> of the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> of your doings

הַגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> Declare בִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye in Judah וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem הַשְׁמִ֔יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> and publish וְאִמְר֕וּ <S%H559><s%> and say [ותִּקְעוּ כ] (תִּקְע֥וּ <S%H8628><s%> blow ק) שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> ye the trumpet בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land קִרְא֤וּ <S%H7121><s%> cry מַלְאוּ֙ <S%H4390><s%> gather together וְאִמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and say הֵאָסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> Assemble וְנָב֖וֹאָה <S%H935><s%> yourselves and let us go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמִּבְצָֽר׃ <S%H4013><s%> into the defenced

שְׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> Set up נֵ֣ס <S%H5251><s%> the standard צִיּ֔וֹנָה <S%H6726><s%> toward Zion הָעִ֖יזוּ <S%H5756><s%> retire אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲמֹ֑דוּ <S%H5975><s%> stay כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> evil אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> not for I will bring מִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north וְשֶׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> destruction גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> and a great

עָלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> is come up אַרְיֵה֙ <S%H738><s%> The lion מִֽסֻּבְּכ֔וֹ <S%H5441><s%> from his thicket וּמַשְׁחִ֣ית <S%H7843><s%> and the destroyer גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles נָסַ֖ע <S%H5265><s%> is on his way יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> he is gone forth מִמְּקֹמ֑וֹ <S%H4725><s%> from his place לָשׂ֤וּם <S%H7760><s%> to make אַרְצֵךְ֙ <S%H776><s%> thy land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> desolate עָרַ֥יִךְ <S%H5892><s%> [and] thy cities תִּצֶּ֖ינָה <S%H5327><s%> shall be laid waste מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> without an inhabitant

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise חִגְר֥וּ <S%H2296><s%> For this gird שַׂקִּ֖ים <S%H8242><s%> you with sackcloth סִפְד֣וּ <S%H5594><s%> lament וְהֵילִ֑ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> and howl כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not שָׁ֛ב <S%H7725><s%> is not turned back חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> for the fierce אַף־ <S%H639><s%> anger יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at פ

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass at that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יֹאבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> shall perish לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> [that] the heart הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וְלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> and the heart הַשָּׂרִ֑ים <S%H8269><s%> of the princes וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> shall be astonished הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests וְהַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets יִתְמָֽהוּ׃ <S%H8539><s%> shall wonder

וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲהָ֣הּ ׀ <S%H162><s%> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אָכֵן֩ <S%H403><s%> surely הַשֵּׁ֨א <S%H5377><s%> thou hast greatly הִשֵּׁ֜אתָ <S%H5377><s%> deceived לָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this וְלִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Ye shall have peace יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will have לָכֶ֑ם וְנָגְעָ֥ה <S%H5060><s%> reacheth חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> whereas the sword עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַנָּֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> unto the soul

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> it יֵאָמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> shall it be said לָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> to this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> to this וְלִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> and to Jerusalem ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind צַ֤ח <S%H6703><s%> A dry שְׁפָיִים֙ <S%H8205><s%> of the high places בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> of my people ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not לִזְר֖וֹת <S%H2219><s%> not to fan וְל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> and not לְהָבַֽר׃ <S%H1305><s%> nor to cleanse

ר֧וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind מָלֵ֛א <S%H4392><s%> [Even] a full מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> this יָ֣בוֹא <S%H935><s%> from those [places] shall come לִ֑י עַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> unto me now also will I give מִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> sentence אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold כַּעֲנָנִ֣ים <S%H6051><s%> as clouds יַעֲלֶ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> Behold he shall come up וְכַסּוּפָה֙ <S%H5492><s%> [shall be] as a whirlwind מַרְכְּבוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4818><s%> and his chariots קַלּ֥וּ <S%H7043><s%> are swifter מִנְּשָׁרִ֖ים <S%H5404><s%> than eagles סוּסָ֑יו <S%H5483><s%> his horses א֥וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לָ֖נוּ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדָּֽדְנוּ׃ <S%H7703><s%> unto us for we are spoiled

כַּבְּסִ֨י <S%H3526><s%> wash מֵרָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> from wickedness לִבֵּךְ֙ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּוָּשֵׁ֑עִי <S%H3467><s%> that thou mayest be saved עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֛י <S%H4970><s%> How תָּלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> lodge בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ךְ <S%H7130><s%> within מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <S%H4284><s%> thoughts אוֹנֵֽךְ׃ <S%H205><s%> How long shall thy vain

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> For a voice מַגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> declareth מִדָּ֑ן <S%H1835><s%> from Dan וּמַשְׁמִ֥יעַ <S%H8085><s%> and publisheth אָ֖וֶן <S%H205><s%> affliction מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> from mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim

הַזְכִּ֣ירוּ <S%H2142><s%> Make ye mention לַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> to the nations הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> now הַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> behold publish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem נֹצְרִ֥ים <S%H5341><s%> [that] watchers בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> come מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country הַמֶּרְחָ֑ק <S%H4801><s%> from a far וַֽיִּתְּנ֛וּ <S%H5414><s%> and give out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> against the cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah קוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H6963><s%> their voice

כְּשֹׁמְרֵ֣י <S%H8104><s%> As keepers שָׂדַ֔י <S%H7704><s%> of a field הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> are against מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> are they against her round about כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> מָרָ֖תָה <S%H4784><s%> because she hath been rebellious נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> against me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

דַּרְכֵּךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> Thy way וּמַ֣עֲלָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H4611><s%> and thy doings עָשׂ֥וֹ <S%H6213><s%> have procured אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לָ֑ךְ זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> this thy רָעָתֵךְ֙ <S%H7451><s%> these [things] unto thee this [is] thy wickedness כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> How מָ֔ר <S%H4751><s%> because it is bitter כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> How נָגַ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> because it reacheth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לִבֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H3820><s%> unto thine heart ס

מֵעַ֣י ׀ <S%H4578><s%> My bowels מֵעַ֨י ׀ <S%H4578><s%> my bowels [אָחוּלָה כ] (אֹוחִ֜ילָה <S%H2342><s%> bear ק) קִיר֥וֹת <S%H7023><s%> at my very לִבִּ֛י <S%H3820><s%> heart הֹֽמֶה־ <S%H1993><s%> maketh a noise לִּ֥י לִבִּ֖י <S%H3820><s%> my heart לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אַחֲרִ֑ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> in me I cannot hold my peace כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound שׁוֹפָר֙ <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet [שָׁמַעְתִּי כ] (שָׁמַ֣עַתְּ <S%H8085><s%> listen ק) נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> O my soul תְּרוּעַ֖ת <S%H8643><s%> the alarm מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> of war

שֶׁ֤בֶר <S%H7667><s%> Destruction עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שֶׁ֙בֶר֙ <S%H7667><s%> upon destruction נִקְרָ֔א <S%H7121><s%> is cried כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדְּדָ֖ה <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the whole land פִּתְאֹם֙ <S%H6597><s%> suddenly שֻׁדְּד֣וּ <S%H7703><s%> spoiled אֹהָלַ֔י <S%H168><s%> are my tents רֶ֖גַע <S%H7281><s%> in a moment יְרִיעֹתָֽי׃ <S%H3407><s%> [and] my curtains

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> How אֶרְאֶה־ <S%H7200><s%> How long shall I see נֵּ֑ס <S%H5251><s%> the standard אֶשְׁמְעָ֖ה <S%H8085><s%> [and] hear ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <S%H7782><s%> cornet ס

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אֱוִ֣יל <S%H191><s%> [is] foolish עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> For my people אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יָדָ֔עוּ <S%H3045><s%> they have not known בָּנִ֤ים <S%H1121><s%> children סְכָלִים֙ <S%H5530><s%> me they [are] sottish הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no נְבוֹנִ֖ים <S%H995><s%> and they have none understanding הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They חֲכָמִ֥ים <S%H2450><s%> they [are] wise הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> like לְהָרַ֔ע <S%H7489><s%> to do evil וּלְהֵיטִ֖יב <S%H3190><s%> but to do good לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יָדָֽעוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> they have no knowledge

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I beheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold תֹ֖הוּ <S%H8414><s%> and lo [it was] without form וָבֹ֑הוּ <S%H922><s%> and void וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> and the heavens וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> had אוֹרָֽם׃ <S%H216><s%> and they [had] no light

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I beheld הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold רֹעֲשִׁ֑ים <S%H7493><s%> and lo they trembled וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and all the hills הִתְקַלְקָֽלוּ׃ <S%H7043><s%> moved lightly
